data.text: @Acertaintom @RoyalStatSoc I'm not aware of 'blackballing' ever being a thing at the RSS, but @HistoryofStats or @JanetJanFoster might know more
@scottmkeir @RoyalStatSoc Is there a record of the tradition of 'black-balling' and the procurement of the urn used to do so?
@scottmkeir @RoyalStatSoc Padlocks on the tins. Clearly statisticians not to be trusted.

@Acertaintom @RoyalStatSoc We should probably make the same stipulation for PowerPoint! 
The disparity between numbers of chairs and numbers of cups and saucers - happy to say they did buy more chairs fairly quickly, and perhaps they hired other rooms too. https://t.co/teIp9Atufa
@scottmkeir @RoyalStatSoc Only 18 chairs makes it fairly exclusive - but important to be clear that the blackboard was for diagrams
